post:
Hey All,

Got some excess rack space sitting idle i'd figure I would offer up to anyone keen.

**1U Colocation**
0.8 Amps @ 230V - A+B Power if hardware supports  
1 IP address  
/64 IPv6 available after June 2018  
3TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps - Free upgrade to 10Gbps handoff with a ticket  
Free rack and stack  
BGP available for $100/setup with free ongoings.  
$75 AUD/month  
[Order here](https://portal.packet.gg/cart.php?a=add&pid=104)  

Also have Raspberry Pi colo available for the following:

**Raspberry Pi Colocation - Sydney**  
1 IP address  
/64 IPv6 available after June 2018  
1.5TB Bandwidth @ 100Mbps  
Free rack and stack  
No case or cables required.  
BGP Available for $100/Setup, free ongoings.  
$10 AUD/month  
[Order here](https://portal.packet.gg/cart.php?a=add&pid=83)
